nodes.text: The Regent of Alderaan was a position in the court of Alderaan. The Lorrdian comedian Rewello once performed for an individual holding that office sometime during the rise of the Galactic Empire.

A "Regent of Alderaan" was mentioned in the 1993 roleplaying guide Han Solo and the Corporate Sector Sourcebook. In the 67th issue of The Official Star Wars Fact File, it was also stated that Bail Prestor Organa transferred his functions to a regent in order to become senator.
